title: Bitcoin’s Negative Correlation With Nasdaq Persists, and History Suggests a Bottom May Be Forming
contentSnippet: Historical patterns show that bitcoin often bottoms when its correlation with the Nasdaq 100 breaks down, a dynamic now appearing for the fourth time in five years.

title: Solmate looks beyond SOL treasury model with RockawayX acquisition
contentSnippet: The deal would fold RockawayX’s infrastructure, liquidity and asset-management businesses into Solmate, widening revenue streams for the SOL-focused treasury company.

title: Crypto Investor Donates $12M to UK's Reform Party
contentSnippet: Christopher Harborne has invested in stablecoin issuer Tether and crypto exchange Bitfinex, according to reports.

title: Ex-Signature Bank Execs Launch Blockchain-Powered Narrow Bank Backed by Paradigm, Winklevoss
contentSnippet: N3XT Bank, operating under a Wyoming charter, aims to provide programmable U.S. dollar payments around the clock without lending deposits.

title: TD Cowen Grows Bearish on $60 Billion Bitcoin Giant Strategy—Here's Why
contentSnippet: After Strategy established a $1.44 billion cash reserve and said it may need to sell Bitcoin, TD Cowen has lowed its MSTR price target.

title: Reform UK Gets Britain's Biggest Political Donation Ever From Tether Investor
contentSnippet: DigFinex shareholder Christopher Harborne donated $11.4 million to Reform UK, the largest ever gift to a UK political party by a living donor.

title: Sovereign Wealth Funds Were Buyers as Bitcoin Plunged: BlackRock's Larry Fink
contentSnippet: The CEO of the asset management giant, whose IBIT is the largest of the spot BTC ETFs, said the state actors were buying not for a trade, but to hold for years.

title: BNB Nears $910 as Volume Jumps 68%, Signaling Growing Interest Near Resistance Zone
contentSnippet: The token is trading in a sideways range, holding above recent lows near $896, while a breakout above $920-$928 resistance could push BNB toward $1,000.

title: Malaysia Cracks Down on Bitcoin Miners Behind $1.1B Electricity Theft
contentSnippet: A new taskforce is using drones and sensors to find power thieves, after 14,000 illicit mining operations have been uncovered over five years.

title: Meta Plans 30% Cut to Metaverse Budget as Reality Becomes Less Virtual: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Horizon Worlds and Quest are facing layoffs as Meta retreats further from its $70 billion bet on virtual reality, people familiar with the matter told Bloomberg.

title: What Triggered Recent $4B Bitcoin ETF Outflows?
contentSnippet: Recent outflows from U.S.-listed spot bitcoin ETFs were driven by specific arbitrage trade closures, not widespread institutional panic.

title: CFTC greenlights spot crypto trading on US exchanges
contentSnippet: Acting CFTC Chair Caroline Pham said the move was intended to drive trading activity to US exchanges, rather than offshore ones “that lack basic safeguards.”

title: BONK Edges Higher as Narrow-Range Trading Holds Above Key Support
contentSnippet: The Solana meme token posted a modest gain while repeated resistance tests and shifting volume patterns kept price action confined to a tight band.

title: ICP Rises as Cross-Chain Narratives Gain Attention
contentSnippet: Internet Computer edged higher as broader market consolidation kept price action pinned to key support and resistance levels.

title: BlackRock is RISK On! Polymarket launches US App! Crypto still Green!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors traded slightly higher, with ETH leading gains post-Fusaka as BTC rose 1% to $93,000, ETH jumped 4% to $3,190, and BNB and SOL each added 1% to reach $909 and $143, respectively. Among t

title: Bitcoin Treasury Twenty One Set to Begin Trading on NYSE With $4 Billion BTC Stash
contentSnippet: Twenty One Capital is set to begin trading as XXI on the New York Stock Exchange on December 9, launching with $4 billion worth of Bitcoin.

title: Blockdaemon, VerifiedX Join Forces to Deliver Mass-Market, Self-Custodial DeFi
contentSnippet: The experience, which is designed to feel like Venmo or Cash App, allows users to earn yield on bitcoin (BTC) and stablecoins and borrow against their holdings.

title: Bitcoin rejects at key $93.5K as Fed rate-cut bets meet 'strong' bear case
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price action fell back toward $90,000 on strong US jobs data as BTC ignored Fed rate-cut  optimism, failing to flip the yearly open to support.

title: Exclusive data from EigenPhi reveals that sandwich attacks on Ethereum have waned
contentSnippet: Exclusive data shows that MEV attacks hit hundreds of traders on Ethereum each month and continue to result in millions in losses.

title: Pepe memecoin website exploited, redirecting users to malware: Blockaid
contentSnippet: The website of the Pepe memecoin has been hit with a front-end attack, and users are encouraged to stay clear of the website.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: BlackRock stays risk-on into 2026, Binance Launches ‘Binance Junior’ for Kids, Kalshi Partners with CNN - Daily Crypto Recap
contentSnippet: Decrypt's daily crypto news recap with @tyler_did_it. Your crypto round-up for December 4th 2025

title: EU plan boosts ESMA powers over crypto and capital markets
contentSnippet: The European Commission plans to expand ESMA oversight of MiCA crypto companies and trading venues, aiming to streamline EU markets and narrow the gap with the US.

title: Bitcoin looks increasingly like it did in 2022: Can BTC price avoid $68K?
contentSnippet: Onchain data points to a major Bitcoin price drop in the making, while a bearish technical structure projected a drop to $68,000.

title: Argentine state-owned energy giant weighs crypto payments for fuel: Report
contentSnippet: Argentina’s state oil company, YPF, is reportedly exploring crypto payments at its fuel stations as adoption of digital assets rises, following the recent rollout of US dollar transactions.

title: Portal to Bitcoin raises $25M and launches atomic OTC desk
contentSnippet: Portal to Bitcoin raised $25 million and launched an HTLC-based atomic OTC desk aimed at enabling trustless, crosschain large trade settlement.

title: Thailand Busts $8.6M Bitcoin Mining Operations Funding 'Chinese Scam Networks'
contentSnippet: Southeast Asian nations are ramping up enforcement as illegal mining operations drain power grids and bankroll cybercrime networks.

title: Morning Minute: BlackRock Goes Risk-On for 2026
contentSnippet: The investment giant is pointing to AI and digital assets like stablecoins as big forces driving change and growth in the economy.

title: Solana ETFs See Record Outflow as 21Shares' TSOL Bleeds $42M
contentSnippet: Solana ETFs saw a record $32M outflow as 21Shares' fund bled $42M, contradicting a $321M on-chain capital influx to the network.

title: Bitcoin ATM Operator Coinme Ordered to Return Over $8M to Customers
contentSnippet: The Seattle-based Bitcoin ATM operator faces revocation of its license after allegedly claiming unredeemed customer vouchers as income.

title: MUFGグループ、トークン化MMFの商品化へ Progmatと協業開始
contentSnippet: 2026年に機関投資家向け提供を目指す三菱UFJアセットマネジメント、三菱UFJモルガン・スタンレー証券、三菱UFJ信託銀行の3社は4日、Progmat（プログマ）との協業を発表した。日本初となるトークン化投資信託の商品化に向け、基盤整備を...

title: FRB利下げと流動性回復、2026年の仮想通貨市場に追い風か＝Delphi Digitalレポート
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨リサーチ企業Delphi Digitalは、FRBの利下げ継続とQT終了、TGA取り崩し、RRP枯渇により、2026年に仮想通貨市場にとって追い風となる流動性環境が生まれると分析。ビットコインやイーサリアムなどデジタル資産に有利との見方を示した。

title: ランボルギーニとレジャー、限定ウォレット発表　「いつランボ買える」ミームに呼応
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ハードウェアウォレット大手レジャーとイタリア高級車ランボルギーニが提携し、限定版「Ledger Stax」を2026年初頭に発売。フェラーリやポルシェなど高級ブランドのWeb3参入が加速する中、24万人超の仮想通貨ミリオネア増加が背景に。

title: 米コネチカット州がロビンフッドなど3社に停止命令、無免許でスポーツ賭博提供と主張
contentSnippet: コネチカット州消費者保護局がロビンフッド、クリプトドットコム、カルシに無免許オンライン賭博運営の停止命令を発行した。3社は州法に違反してスポーツ賭博を提供しており、利用者の資金や情報にリスクをもたらしているという。

title: チャールズ・シュワブ、2026年前半に仮想通貨取引開始へ　既存取引所に手数料圧力か
contentSnippet: 米大手証券チャールズ・シュワブが2026年前半にビットコインとイーサリアムのスポット取引を開始。低手数料戦略で既存取引所に圧力か。バンガードやバンク・オブ・アメリカも参入し、ウォール街で仮想通貨の主流化が加速。

title: メタマスク、最大1万ドルの損失を補償する「トランザクション・シールド」開始
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ウォレット「メタマスク」が有料補償サービス「トランザクション・シールド」を開始。対象となる取引について月額9.99ドルで最大1万ドルの損失を補償する。

title: NTT Digital、仮想通貨ソラナのバリデータを運用開始
contentSnippet: NTTドコモグループのNTT DigitalがSolanaバリデータ運用を開始。Dawn Labsが技術支援を担う。国内ではモブキャストHDもソラナ財団認定を取得するなど、企業参入が加速している。

title: 三井物産デジタルAM、デジタル証券ファンドを早期償還
contentSnippet: 三井物産デジタル・アセットマネジメントは、デジタル証券ファンド「日本橋・人形町」を早期償還し、当初予想3.0%を上回る年5.0%の利回りを達成。累計利益分配金は25億円を突破した。

title: 「バイナンス・ジュニア」、キッズ向け仮想通貨口座導入　安全性に関する議論も
contentSnippet: バイナンスが6～17歳向けの仮想通貨プログラム「バイナンス・ジュニア」を開始した。親の監督下でシンプルアーンによる資産運用などが可能となる。

title: イーサリアム保有企業購入量、ピークから80%急減　ビットワイズが指摘
contentSnippet: ビットワイズの報告によると、イーサリアム保有企業の11月購入量は8月比81%減の37万ETHに急減。一方、ビットマイン社は12月に1.5億ドル相当を追加購入し、フサカアップグレードへの期待を示した。
